1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Abort reasons.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort.Reason
7  ( -- * Data type
8    AbortReason (..),
9    AbortTag,
10
11    -- * Derived type
12    Ab, AbMap, MapAb, AbManyMap,
13    AbTest, IOAb, BinAb,
14  
15    -- * Creation
16    abortBecause,
17    abortLine, abortLines,
18    abortPage,
19
20    -- * Alteration
21    Abortable,
22    abortable,
23    unabort,
24  ) where
25
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture   as O
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO    as B
28
29
30-- --------------------------------------------  Type
31
32-- | Abort reason.
33data AbortReason = AbortReason
34    { abortReason :: String       -- ^ Reason in one line
35    , abortDetail :: [String]     -- ^ Detailed description
36    , abortNote   :: [String]     -- ^ Additional notes for long description
37    , abortPoint  :: [(AbortTag, B.CodePos)] -- ^ Tag and aborting point
38    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
39
40-- | Tag on aborting point.
41type AbortTag = String
42
43
44-- --------------------------------------------  Deriving type
45
46-- | Abortable result, i.e., either of right result or abort reason.
47type Ab a = Either AbortReason a
48
49-- | Abortable mapping.
50type AbMap a = a -> Ab a
51
52-- | Abortable-to-abortable mapping.
53type MapAb a = Ab a -> Ab a
54
55-- | Abortable many map.
56type AbManyMap a = a -> Ab [a]
57
58-- | Abortable Boolean-valued function.
59type AbTest a = a -> Ab Bool
60
61-- | Abortable I/O.
62type IOAb a = IO (Ab a)
63
64-- | Type for abortable binary operators.
65type BinAb a = a -> a -> Ab a
66
67
68-- --------------------------------------------  Creation
69
70-- | Construct abort reason with reason text.
71abortBecause :: String -> AbortReason
72abortBecause r = AbortReason r [] [] []
73
74-- | Construct abort reason with reason and detailed text.
75abortLine :: String -> String -> AbortReason
76abortLine  r d = AbortReason r [d] [] []
77
78-- | Construct abort reason with reason and multilined detailed text.
79abortLines :: String -> [String] -> AbortReason
80abortLines r d = AbortReason r d [] []
81
82-- | Construct abort reason with reason and note.
83abortPage :: String -> [String] -> AbortReason
84abortPage  r n = AbortReason r [] n []
85
86
87-- --------------------------------------------  Alteration
88
89-- | Abortable process.
90type Abortable cp b = cp -> MapAb b
91
92-- | Push source information when process is aborted.
93abortable :: (B.GetCodePos cp) => AbortTag -> Abortable cp b
94abortable tag cp = either (Left . push tag (B.getCPs cp)) Right
95
96push :: AbortTag -> [B.CodePos] -> O.Map AbortReason
97push _ [] a = a
98push tag (p:_) a@AbortReason { abortPoint = ps } =
99    a { abortPoint = (tag, p) : ps }
100
101-- | Extract right value or print error message.
102unabort :: Ab a -> a
103unabort (Right a)  = a
104unabort (Left a)   = error $ abortReason a
